channel.title: [Suggestion] GOTM
channel.description:
FastBawlz, can you please consider doing a Graphic of the Month. Contestants can use Photoshop, GIMP, 3DS Max, Terragen, Maya, C4D ect (whatever they want) to create a large image that impresses the voters. I think this would be a really good add on as I like competing in competitions that have to really make me work for a week or two.
Maybe you could speak to an admin about a reward? [br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 04:56:57 AM[/size][hr]Opinions?

item.title: [Suggestion] GOTM
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

[quote=“welshy, post:3, topic:129266”][quote author=MybBob link=topic=179393.msg1644725#msg1644725 date=1186009814]
Fastbawlz is just a sectional moderator, since when does he have clearence to accept a big decision for a active board ?

And this idea has been declined a shit load of times anyway
[/quote] haha not a board just a pinned topic like the sotw[/quote]

You obviously missread what I put, by a active board I mean this one ( The graphics board ) Saying that when does a sectional moderator have clearence to give another competition ?

maru:

What welshy said. MybBob, can I see a topic where this has been declined?

You go searching, I remember it being asked a few times, but the difference is they wanted SOTM, Signaute of the month, your just wanting to change the S To a G.

So yeah, basically thats what I’m saying

Read full topic
